alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 16 at 4:42AM AKST until December 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Visibility of one quarter mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...West of Dillingham. * WHEN...From 5 AM to noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
